author: Special Correspondent
text:
Gandhi Memorial Museum here is conducting a month-long training programme in yoga, pranayama, meditation and balanced diet from Monday.

According to a press release, three batches of classes will be held at 6 a.m.,10.30 a.m., 5 p.m. The classes at 10.30 a.m. will be exclusively for women. The training is open to all.

Those suffering from diabetes, hypertension, obesity, respiratory disorders, ortho problems and stress would be greatly benefited, the release added.

Interested persons can register themselves with K.P. Gangadharan, yoga coordinator, Gandhi Memorial Museum. Phone: 94875 37339.
title: Yoga classes from today
